thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service
thread.title_full: Great service - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Opera Faubourg, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Larry S
title: Great service
text: The rooms are a little small but location is excellent and staff cannot do enough for you. Staff far better than much more expensive hotels. I stayed on business in the Pullman near Tour Eiffell a few days before at two or three times the price and BW staff way ahead of Pullman. We had wonderful stay and will return. Highly recommended!
